item.title: Hello Hugo!
item.description: Starting a Blog It’s New Year’s Resolution time, which is as good a time as any to start my programming blog. I’ll start off by introducing myself. My name is Alex Owens, and I’m a Computer Science student at Northern Kentucky University. I’m in my third year of school, and I’m starting this blog as a really informal way to document my development as a programmer. The format for this site will be pretty simple: weekly blog posts about whatever I’m working on that week.
